        public int[] playChess()

        ??:
        @return - Returns an array of integers. The first value in the array represents the horizontal coordinate of the optimal chess position, and the second value in the array represents the vertical coordinate of the optimal chess position.

        public int maxMin(int level,
                  int alpha,
                  int beta,
                  int[][] board,
                  int go)
        maxMin(Method of using recursion to realize maximum and minimum algorithm.) TODO(In order to improve the speed of AI decision-making, the alpha beta pruning method is also used.)
        ??:
        @param - level This integer represents the depth of the search tree. The deeper the search tree, the better the AI's ability to play chess.
        @param - alpha The maximum in alpha-beta pruning algorithm.
        @param - beta The minimum in alpha-beta pruning algorithm.
        @param - board An array that stores the positions of all the chess pieces.
        @param - go Represents the color of the currently controlled piece.
        @return - Returns the highest situation score after several steps calculated by the maximum and minimum algorithm
